alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Interior Waldo; Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 02 at 3:28PM EST until December 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations greater than 6 inches possible. * WHERE...Interior Waldo, Kennebec, and Androscoggin Counties. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. Road conditions can vary with elevation. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Uncertainty exists on the rain and snow line location. A further south outcome may bring accumulating snowfall further south through the capitol region and I-95 corridor Sunday night into Monday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
